text: Year 21 BC was either a common year starting on Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday or a leap year starting on Tuesday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Lollius and Lepidus. == Events == * Marcus Vipsanius Agrippa divorces Claudia Marcella. He then marries Julia the Elder, daughter of Caesar Augustus. == Births == * Naevius Sutorius Macro, Roman politician (d. AD 38)
title: 21 BC
